content: welcome to krissy s over the mountain crochet and crafts introducing the newest crochet pattern the leprechaun bucket hat crafted with speed and ease in mind this delightful hat will have you feeling festive in no time here s why you ll love it 1 **fast and easy crochet** with the unique technique of holding two strands of yarn and using a large hook you ll breeze through this project faster than finding a four-leaf clover 2 **distinctive design** stand out from the crowd with the leprechaun bucket hat s one-of-a-kind ridge at the crown created using the high back post half_double_crochet stitch 3 **stylish details** complete your hat with two row of black yarn at the brim for a sharp contrast then simply sew on a buckle appliqué and you re ready to hit the town in style 4 **bonus shamrock applique** maybe you feel like going all out and you want to add a cute shamrock to your hat this crochet pattern has that as well don t leave your st patrick s day outfit to chance crochet your own luck with the leprechaun bucket hat pattern today get your pattern now and let the fun begin ️ copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright© krissys over the mountain crochet 2024 do not sell alter or redistribute this pattern in any way or form you have my permission to sell your finished product but you are responsible for the finished product no mass production
